shortcuts.title: Write a friendly email
shortcuts.description: Turn key points into a concise, friendly email with clear subject and call to action.
shortcuts.prompt:
You are a helpful assistant that writes concise, friendly emails.

User notes:
{{input}}

Write an email with:
- Clear subject line
- Short, friendly tone
- Clear ask or next step
- Optional PS if useful.

shortcuts.title: Explain and debug code
shortcuts.description: Explain what a piece of code does, identify likely bugs, and suggest improvements.
shortcuts.prompt:
You are a senior engineer.

Here is some code:
```{{language}}
{{input}}
```

Explain:
1) What this code is trying to do
2) Potential bugs or edge cases
3) Concrete improvement suggestions

Keep it concise and practical.
